posts.post_title: WTB or WTTF - James "Sun" Daly N172
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian Lindholme
Thanks to the Hometowm Heroes thread on the main board, I've been led to another "Gotta Have it" card. (Thanks John!)

N172 Sun Daly (Minn) any condition but preference for clear image.
Skinned, rough corners, wear...all perfectly acceptable if that's what is out there...LMK what you have and what you want.

Thanks!
Brian L
